name: Cloned Blocks
description:
Submission to ScoreSpace Jam #16

Control the Cloned-Blocks and cover all the green targets.  Try to complete all 9 levels in as few moves as possible to get the highest score at the end!

Controls

  • [WASD] - Move Cloned Blocks
  • [Space] - Spawn Cloned Blocks

Credits

  • "Explosion, 8-bit, 01.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
  • "teleport.wav" by DExUS5 of Freesound.org
  • "expressions of the mind (Piano loop)" by ShadyDave of Freesound.org
  • "Summer Time" by Migfus20 of Freesound.org
  • "Technology - Upbeat Loop" by ispeakwaves of Freesound.org
